## Additive Terms

### One Variable

```{r add-one}
add1   <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data=mtcars)
mu    <- mean(mtcars$wt)
names(mu) <- "wt"
terms <- names(coef(add1))

recentering.matrix(mu, terms)
```

### Multiple Variables
```{r add-mult}
addm   <- lm(mpg ~ wt + disp, data=mtcars)
mu    <- colMeans(mtcars[,c("wt", "disp")])
terms <- names(coef(addm))

recentering.matrix(mu, terms)
```

### No-intercept Model
```{r add-noint, error=TRUE}
addm   <- lm(mpg ~ 0 + wt + disp, data=mtcars)
mu    <- colMeans(mtcars[,c("wt", "disp")])
terms <- names(coef(addm))
terms

# matching.terms() encounters an EXTRA term!
#  then vars.in.terms cannot find it
# clean.kron.names() ?????
recentering.matrix(mu, terms)
```

## Interaction Terms

```{r int}
int   <- lm(mpg ~ wt * disp, data=mtcars)
mu    <- colMeans(mtcars[,c("wt", "disp")])
terms <- names(coef(int))

recentering.matrix(mu, terms)
```

## Polynomial Terms

*(not yet fully integrated)*

Still need to bridge the gap between R's formula
  idiosyncracies and the rest of the world!

### One-variable Polynomial
```{r poly}
poly   <- lm(mpg ~ wt + I(wt^2), data=mtcars)
mu    <- mean(mtcars$wt)
names(mu) <- "wt"
terms <- names(coef(poly))
terms[3] <- "wt:wt" # automate this correction!

recentering.matrix(mu, terms)
```

```{r polys}
mu    <- sd(mtcars$wt)
names(mu) <- "wt"
terms <- names(coef(poly))
terms[3] <- "wt:wt" # automate this correction!

recentering.matrix(mu, terms, type="scale")
```

### Polynomial With Interaction
```{r polyint}
polyint   <- lm(mpg ~ (wt + I(wt^2))*disp, data=mtcars)
mu    <- colMeans(mtcars[,c("wt", "disp")])
terms <- names(coef(polyint))
terms[3] <- "wt:wt" # automate this correction!
terms[6] <- "wt:wt:disp" # automate this correction!

recentering.matrix(mu, terms)
```

```{r polyints}
mu    <- colSds(mtcars[,c("wt", "disp")])
terms <- names(coef(polyint))
terms[3] <- "wt:wt" # automate this correction!
terms[6] <- "wt:wt:disp" # automate this correction!

recentering.matrix(mu, terms, type="scale")
```
